entities.description: Used something else to get over/avoid alcohol withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time using or feeling the effects of marijuana or any cannabis product in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time trying to get marijuana or any cannabis product in the past 12 months.
Used marijuana or any cannabis product in larger amounts or for longer periods of time than intended in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates that the respondent used something else to manage alcohol withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Indicates the duration of marijuana or any cannabis product use by the respondent in the past 12 months.
Indicates the effort spent by the respondent trying to acquire marijuana or any cannabis product in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent used marijuana or any cannabis product in larger amounts or for longer than intended in the past 12 months.

triplets.subject: DPALUSE
triplets.object: something else to get over/avoid alcohol withdrawal in past 12 months

triplets.subject: DPMJFEEL
triplets.object: great deal of time using/feeling effect of marijuana or cannabis product in past 12 months

triplets.subject: UDMJTMGEFT
triplets.object: great deal of time trying to get marijuana in past 12 months

triplets.subject: DPMJLRGAMTS
triplets.object: marijuana in larger amounts or for longer time than meant to in past 12 months
